member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlDropHandler.OnDragEnter
member.summary: Called on drag enter to set drag effect, as specified.
member.param: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.
A pointer to an array containing the items being dragged.
Specifies whether drag started outside target area.
The current state of keyboard modifier keys.
On success, contains a pointer to the drag effect value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlDropHandler
member.summary: Exposes handler methods for drag-and-drop. Used by the namespace tree control to notify the client of any drag-and-drop operation happening within the control. Provides a way for a client to intercept a drop operation and perform its own action, or to return the desired drop effect.
